properties.name: Costa Rica
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn This country intrigues me because of their model environmental policies. I would love to go hiking through the rain forests there in search of waterfalls and wildlife.

properties.name: Ghana -Cape Coast
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn This is the home of an artisan workshop called Global Mamas. These women are an amazing example of what fair trade is all about. I hope I get to work along side them one day.

properties.name: Greece
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn This is a must go to destination because I love Greek food. Oh, and I\'ve heard the scenery is kind of nice.

properties.name: Japan - Osaka
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn Another missed opportunity! A good friend of mine is from there and I didn\'t make it over there before she moved to the US. She had to go and marry a Texan! But at least I get to see her more often. Austin is actually a pretty cool place.

properties.name: Kenya - Eldoret
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn This is a fascinating workshop started by the IU-Kenya Partnership\'s AMPATH program which supports people who are HIV positive in Eldoret, Kenya. This goofy map program wouldn\'t allow me to put my marker on Eldoret so I guess I\'ll have to start my journey in Nairobi.

properties.name: New Zealand
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn I would love to explore the entire country!

properties.name: Sri Lanka
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn I love tea and I would really like to visit a small tea farm in Sri Lanka. Being a gardener myself, I would enjoy seeing how they grow and prepare the tea. Also, a friend of my father\'s is from here and has brought back some wonderful red curry for us. Mmmmmm, curry!

properties.name: Thailand, Chiang Mai
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn I have heard stories about Thailand since I was little, my aunt and uncle met there while they were both serving in the Peace Corps. While I was in Vientiane, Laos, I could see Thailand from across the Mekong but I wasn\'t able to work it into my trip to go there. So close, yet so far!

properties.name: Tibet
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn I am fascinated by Tibet and its people and my heart goes out to them. It is frustrating to me that this map does not label the boundaries of Tibet as TIBET! What have you heard about Tibet now that the Olympics are over????

properties.name: Victoria, BC
properties.description: Posted by Jendenn A good friend of mine lives in Victoria and I still haven\'t been there yet!
